name: Industrial Warehouse Floor
desc: High-performance epoxy flooring designed for heavy machinery zones with seamless chemical resistance and dust-proof finish.

name: Pharma Cleanroom Coating
desc: Antimicrobial PU coating system for pharmaceutical environments ensuring hygiene and smooth cleaning operations.

name: Automotive Plant ESD Floor
desc: Anti-static epoxy flooring installed in automotive manufacturing lines to ensure protection of sensitive electronic equipment.

name: Commercial Showroom
desc: Gloss-finish decorative epoxy flooring with high light reflection for a luxury showroom ambience.

name: Food Processing Unit
desc: Seamless PU floor for wet-process zones, with non-slip texture and high thermal shock resistance.

name: Electronics Assembly Area
desc: Conductive ESD flooring that ensures electrostatic discharge protection for sensitive electronics manufacturing.

name: Cold Storage Facility
desc: PU concrete flooring engineered for sub-zero environments with excellent abrasion and moisture resistance.

name: Textile Factory Floor
desc: Epoxy-coated concrete with abrasion-resistant topcoat designed to handle heavy material movement and dye spills.

name: School Laboratory Floor
desc: Chemical-resistant epoxy system ensuring easy maintenance and safety in educational laboratories.

name: Food Retail Outlet
desc: Decorative self-leveling epoxy with high gloss and anti-slip topcoat, enhancing hygiene and aesthetic appeal.

name: Heavy Engineering Unit
desc: Heavy-duty epoxy mortar floor built for impact zones and forklift areas, providing superior load bearing.

name: Waterproof Roof Coating
desc: UV-resistant polyurethane waterproofing membrane applied on industrial roofs for long-term weather protection.

name: Medical Equipment Room
desc: Anti-static and antimicrobial floor combining epoxy and PU hybrid systems for healthcare-grade applications.

name: Cold Chain Logistics Bay
desc: PU concrete flooring engineered for cold storage and loading docks ensuring skid-free performance.

name: Airport Baggage Area
desc: Impact and abrasion-resistant epoxy floor system designed for 24/7 operational loads and easy maintenance.
